title: Pheander, the mayden knight describing his honourable trauailes and hautie attempts in armes, with his successe in loue : enterlaced with many pleasant discourses, wherein the grauer may take delight, and the valiant youthfull, be encouraged by honourable and worthie aduenturing, to gaine fame / written by H.R.
author: H. R. (Henry Roberts), fl. 1585-1616.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Creede, dwelling in Thames streete, neare the old swanne,
